H0.text: Animals are the broad group of organisms characterized by sensory organs, the ability to move, internal digestion, and sexual reproduction.

H1.text: Protists are a broad group of organisms characterized by sensory organs, the ability to move, internal digestion, and sexual reproduction.

H2.text: Plants are the broad group of organisms characterized by sensory organs, the ability to move, internal digestion, and sexual reproduction.

H3.text: Fungi are the broad group of organisms characterized by sensory organs, the ability to move, internal digestion, and sexual reproduction.

A4.text: Animals ingest organic material and digest it internally.

A5.text: motility i.e. able to spontaneously move their bodies during at least part of their life cycle.
